detectors.description: AddressLotteryV2.participate() (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0xe19ca313512e0231340e778abe7110401c737c23-AddressLotteryV2.sol#48-59) uses a weak PRNG: luckyNumberOfAddress(msg.sender) == winnerLuckyNumber (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0xe19ca313512e0231340e778abe7110401c737c23-AddressLotteryV2.sol#54)
